Bittercube Events

We host educational classes, themed cocktail events, plus we can host private intimate gatherings of close friends or mid-sized events up to 45 people.

tasting

Facility Tour (aka, So What Are Bitters Anyways?)

Multiple dates available

Price: $14

Location: Bar & Bazaar

This interactive facility tour starts with a welcome drink in the Bazaar. We will go behind the scenes in the production facility, where we will navigate the entire bitters-making process from raw botanicals to bottling. We'll also make a stop at the R&D lab for a taste of something we are currently working on. The tour finishes with a cocktail of your choice from the Bazaar and aÂ bitters demonstration, during which you'll lick and smell your own hands in front of strangers. Trust us, it's cool and not weird at all. All tour guests get 10% off Bittercube products in the Bazaar.

RSVP at Eventbrite

bar-classes

Mastering the Classics: French 75

September 21, 2019 4:00PM

Price: $15.00

Location: Bittercube Bar

We continue our seven-part cocktail series, Mastering the Classics, with the French 75. In this class, you will familiarize yourself with the tools and learn the technique to properly shake a cocktail, plus learn the golden ratio for a classic French 75 and receive information to make great cocktails at home. Plus, receive 10% off all home bar tools in the Bazaar after the class!

RSVP at Eventbrite

tasting

AEppleTreow Tasting

September 28, 2019 2 - 4:00 PM

Price: FREE

Location: Bittercube Bazaar

Join us on Saturday, September 28 from 2-4 PM for a free tasting of AEppelTreow products. Plus enjoy $5 cocktail specials!

bar-classes

How Do You Like Them Apples?

September 28, 2019 4:00 PM

Price: $20

Location: Bittercube Bar

Apples are incredibly versatile and produce a foundation for a variety of libations. In this class we will show you multiple ways to make great cocktails at home using this delicious fall fruit, featuring AeppleTreow products. Class includes cocktails and a take home gift.

RSVP at Eventbrite

Nothing currently scheduled but check back often as we're always adding new events

Host an Event

Corporate Events

Team building exercises designed for collaboration and teamwork. Small groups are given a restaurant concept and must work together to create a bespoke tonic tailored to the clientele and cuisine. Each small group presents their creation to the larger group. Private Happy Hour for networking

Private Events

Host your wedding, birthday party, anniversary party.

Stop By

We are located at 4828 W Lisbson Ave, Milwaukee WI 53210. There is a public parking lot directly across the street from our building and a crosswalk in front of the police station. There is also ample street parking available in the surrounding neighborhood. Please do not park in parking lots of other businesses. Enter through the front door for both the Bittercube Bar & Bazaar. Tell your Uber/Lyft/taxi driver to drop you off right in front of the building!

(414) 367-4477 Directions
